attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I myself and many others can't afford the tv licence and for people like myself who don't watch the bbc shouldn't have to pay the extortionate amount of money the bbc charges, if the bbc want money then they should be able to put it on pay per view then people who do watch the bbc can pay for it in that way. also people in the republic of ireland don't pay a fee as well as other countries which receive the bbc channels so why should we have to.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
